data.name: About
data.value: SauceNAObot 为您提供了一个界面来使用反向图像搜索引擎 SauceNAO 。 向我发送图像（图像、GIF 或 STICKER），我将尝试使用 SauceNAO API 查找来源。 This bot was created by a third party to use SauceNAO on Telegram. The project has not any affiliation with Xamayon (the creator of SauceNAO).

data.name: Anticheats
data.value: 使用此功能可以避免在群聊中对特定机器人发送的图像进行反向查找。 To add a bot to AntiCheat list, just reply to a message sent by the bot with /anticheats add. To remove the bot, reply to the message with /anticheats remove .

data.name: AnticheatsAdded
data.value: Bot {0} 已添加到反作弊列表中。

data.name: AnticheatsAlreadyExists
data.value: Bot {0} 已存在于反作弊列表中。

data.name: AnticheatsDeleted
data.value: Bot {0} 已从反作弊列表中删除。

data.name: AnticheatsDoesNotExist
data.value: Bot {0} 不存在于反作弊列表中。

data.name: AnticheatsMessage
data.value: 哇，没有作弊，伙计。

data.name: AntiCheatsNotABot
data.value: 目标用户不是机器人。

data.name: ApiKey
data.value: If you are already supporting Xamayon (the original creator of saucenao.com), then you can configure the bot to use your own API key to get your sauces instead of using shared API keys. /apikey status - Check the status of your saved api key. /apikey set <your api key> - Save your API Plus key. Do not use free API keys or it will cause problems for you. /apikey delete - Delete your saved api key.

data.name: ApiKeyDeleted
data.value: 已保存的 API 密钥已被删除。

data.name: ApiKeyNew
data.value: 完成的！ 从现在开始，机器人将使用您的 API 密钥。 要删除它，请使用 /apikey delete。

data.name: ApiKeyNone
data.value: There is no api key configured.

data.name: ApiKeyStatus
data.value: 机器人配置为使用以下 API 密钥 {0}

data.name: Busy
data.value: SauceNao is very busy right now. Please try again later or try using /temp command. If this message appears frequently, please check the support chat.

data.name: BusyPolling
data.value: SauceNao is very busy right now. Please try again later. If this message appears frequently, please check the support chat.

data.name: BuyMeACookie
data.value: Your contributions are used to pay for the bot's hosting and the shared account that we use to search for your sauces. If you have any other questions, ask in the support chat. - Buy me a cookie! - Bitcoin: bc1q0w43tprjn80zn248k7xlztu7lvhkzgy6dak8mt - Toncoin: EQC3SWZxs_4ive2aD-njns1KnB4S2RUgaxDKJ7X44VA52SsY Note: Please be sure to confirm the amount you will donate. We don't make refunds.

data.name: Creator
data.value: 我的创作者是 Derek Nieves

data.name: EmptyRequest
data.value: You need to reply to an image file (image, GIF or a sticker)

data.name: FailedConvertFile
data.value: 无法将文件转换为兼容文件。

data.name: GeneratingTmpUrl
data.value: 正在生成临时链接...

data.name: GroupsOnly
data.value: 该命令只能在群聊中使用。

data.name: Help
data.value: 向我发送图像文件（图像、GIF 或 STICKER）以查找其来源。 If I'm in a group, reply to an image with /sauce . Forward the media files you have searched along with their sauce via bot. More Info: /help MyHistory. Use my Anti-Cheat feature in your groups when playing "Guess the Character". More Info: /help AntiCheats

data.name: History
data.value: You can send images with sauce from your recent history via bot. The history will be erased periodically. If you want to delete your history right now, type /history clear.

data.name: HistoryButton
data.value: 查看搜索历史

data.name: HistoryErased
data.value: 您的历史记录已被删除。 在线搜索结果可能需要几分钟才能消失，因为它们已被缓存。

data.name: HistoryNone
data.value: This seems somewhat empty. Try to find some sauces.

data.name: InvalidPhoto
data.value: 那看起来不像图像文件。

data.name: LocalMode
data.value: Bot is currently running in local mode, so this feature is disabled.

data.name: LocalModeFile
data.value: This file cannot be processed at this time, the bot is running in local mode. Some files need to be uploaded as temporary files, but this feature is not available in local mode.

data.name: MissingParams
data.value: 您没有指定足够的参数来使用此函数。

data.name: NotFound
data.value: 未找到结果。 也许您想尝试使用 Google 反向搜索 或Yandex代替？ 或查看SauceNAO 网站以查看所有结果。

data.name: NotFoundLocalMode
data.value: 未找到结果。 由于机器人在本地模式下运行，备用链接不可用。

data.name: PrivateChatsOnly
data.value: This command only works in private chats.

data.name: ResultCharacter
data.value: 人物

data.name: ResultCharacters
data.value: Characters

data.name: ResultCreator
data.value: 创造者

data.name: ResultMaterial
data.value: 材料

data.name: ResultPart
data.value: 部分

data.name: ResultTime
data.value: Time

data.name: ResultYear
data.value: 年

data.name: Searching
data.value: Searching...

data.name: SetLang
data.value: 使用此命令可以更改当前聊天中的回复语言。 句法： /setlang <语言代码> [-Force] 可用的语言是： * 英语（默认）：en * 西班牙语：es * 简体中文：zh-hans * 印尼语：id 指定可选的 [-Force] 参数以将您的语言保留在任何组中，而不管组的语言如何。

data.name: SetLangSaved
data.value: 您的语言首选项已保存。

data.name: Source
data.value: 来源

data.name: Statistics
data.value: Usage Statistics {0} successful searches in the last 20 days. Used by {1} users. Used by {2} groups.

data.name: SupportChat
data.value: 支持聊天

data.name: TemporalUrlDone
data.value: 完成的！ 试试你的 临时链接。

data.name: TooBigFile
data.value: The search could not be performed. The file size is too large.
